metadata.purpose: AI research agent extraction template with existing database references

source_documents.notes: Primary source for this client entry

database_references.description: Existing data in the NukeWorks database to help match and link extracted information

extraction_instructions.matching_strategy: When extracting information from PDFs, use the database_references section above to identify and link existing records. This helps ensure data consistency and proper relationship mapping.

company_matching.instructions: If you find a company name in the PDF, check the existing_companies list. If there's a match (exact or close match), use that company_id instead of creating a new entry.
examples: If PDF mentions 'NuScale' → Link to company_id: 1
If PDF mentions 'Duke' or 'Duke Energy' → Link to company_id: 2
If PDF mentions a new company not in list → Mark as new_company and provide company details

internal_personnel_matching.instructions: When you encounter MPR employee names in PDFs, check existing_internal_personnel. Match by name, title, or email if found.
examples: If PDF mentions 'John Smith, Senior Project Manager' → Use personnel_id: 1
If PDF mentions 'Jane Doe from Business Development' → Use personnel_id: 2
If you find an MPR employee not in the list → Mark as new_internal_personnel

external_personnel_matching.instructions: Match external contacts from PDFs against existing_external_personnel by name, company, and title.
examples: If PDF mentions 'Robert Johnson from NuScale' → Use personnel_id: 101
If PDF mentions 'Sarah Williams, Director of Strategy at NuScale' → Use personnel_id: 102
If you find a new external contact → Mark as new_external_personnel with full details

external_client.notes: Primary nuclear technology vendor. Strategic partnership with MPR.

next_steps: Schedule follow-up meeting on advanced reactor licensing strategy
Coordinate with engineering team on component specification
Establish working group for supply chain optimization
client_near_term_focus_areas: Small Modular Reactor (SMR) development and certification
Supply chain resilience and vendor diversification
Advanced manufacturing capabilities for next-generation reactors
mpr_work_targets_goals: Identify cost optimization opportunities in manufacturing
Develop strategic recommendations for supply chain
client_strategic_objectives_priorities: Deploy first commercial SMR unit by 2027
Achieve supply chain redundancy for critical components
Establish thought leadership in advanced reactor technology
fields.general_discussion: Client is progressing well on SMR development milestones. They expressed strong interest in MPR's supply chain optimization consulting. Key risks include supply chain delays and regulatory uncertainties. Strong opportunity for expanded engagement in advanced manufacturing consulting.

client_profile.relationship_notes: Long-standing partnership with growing engagement. Multiple business units actively working with MPR.

additional_context.key_achievements: Successfully navigated regulatory challenges; strong technical progress on core reactor design
additional_context.risks_concerns: Supply chain vulnerabilities; regulatory timeline uncertainties
additional_context.competitive_landscape: Competing with other SMR developers; strong differentiation through manufacturing efficiency
additional_context.opportunities: Potential for multi-year consulting engagement; technology licensing opportunities

data_quality_notes.general: Prioritize accuracy over completeness. Leave fields null/empty if information cannot be found or verified.
data_quality_notes.matching_confidence: Always include db_match_confidence and db_match_reason fields when linking to existing database records.
data_quality_notes.new_records: For any external company, internal employee, or external contact NOT found in database_references, clearly mark as 'new' and provide all details.
data_quality_notes.conflicts: If you find conflicting information (e.g., different phone number for same contact), include a note explaining the discrepancy and your confidence level.
